subject: Virtual Clock test pattern
msgSnippet: Some time ago I proposed a Virtual Clock pattern on the XP mailing list. I was encouraged by Kent Beck to write it down, and at long last I did. Document:
messageBody:
Some time ago I proposed a "Virtual Clock" pattern on the XP mailing list. I
was encouraged by Kent Beck to write it down, and at long last I did.

Document:
http://www.nusco.org/docs/virtual_clock_draft1.pdf

Discussion page:
http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?VirtualClock.


---------------
Paolo Perrotta
Bologna, Italy
